definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 mpl. [[נוֹאֲלוּ]] Is 19:3, Je 5:4; [[וְנׁאָָלוּ]] Je 50:36; 1 pl. [[נוֹאַלְנוּ]] Nu 12:11; —do or act foolishly:—
shew wicked folly = sin [[חַטָּאת]] [[אֲשֶׁר נוֹאַלְנוּ וַאֲשֶׁר חָטָאנוּ]] Nu 12:11 (J); in Je 5:4 an exhibition of this folly is ascribed to ignorance.

become fools, lacking insight and judgment: [[נוֹאֲלוּ שְׂרֵי חׂעַן]] Is 19:13 the princes of Zoan have become fools (‖[[נִשְּׁאוּ שָׂרֵי נׁף]], and, in v:Is 19:11 [[אֱוִילִים]] [[שָׂרֵי חׂעַן]], etc.); [[חֶדֶב אֶל־הַבַּדִּים וְנׁאָָלוּ]] Je 50:36 a sword is against the praters, and they shall become fools—be shewn up as such (‖ : [[חָֽתּוּ]]).
